title: Client Crashed Mid Game, Marked as Leaving
body: I'm not sure if this is the right board for this, but I was playing as Syndra in a normals, draft pick. Was winning game, and then started lagging hard. Game crashed and forced a search on my files to find the issue. Because of this, i did not get back into game. The enemy team surrendered before i could load back in. I was not awarded IP, but also not hit with a leaver buster.  Is my IP lost or is there a way i can get this back?

replies.body: Getting marked as a leaver disqualifies an account from receiving IP, EXP, or LP for that match.  I know leaving was not intentional, but the [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)system treats all leaves equally because they still cause others a negative experience.  It sounds like your patcher was identifying and repairing potentially corrupt game data.  Hopefully, the issue is now resolved but I recommend going over our [Game Crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide just in case.
Thank you for your help, I'll look through it and see what i can do to prevent this in the future.
